typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		MANDT as string,
		CARRID as string,
		CONNID as string,
		FLDATE as string,
		BOOKID as string,
		CUSTOMID as string,
		CUSTTYPE as string,
		SMOKER as string,
		LUGGWEIGHT as string,
		WUNIT as string,
		INVOICE as string,
		CLASS as string,
		FORCURAM as string,
		FORCURKEY as string,
		LOCCURAM as string,
		LOCCURKEY as string,
		ORDER_DATE as string,
		COUNTER as string,
		AGENCYNUM as string,
		CANCELLED as string,
		RESERVED as string,
		PASSNAME as string,
		PASSFORM as string,
		PASSBIRTH as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Booking
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Customer
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Flight
Booking, Flight join(ERROR_FUNCTION('') == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1
